name: Fight the Landlord
description:
A game of competition and card collection.Use your skills and items to win the game!The game has single-player mode and online mode.

[Game Features]

◆Free to play the two-dimensional battle landlord game.

◆Original fighting landlord gameplay: fighting skills mode, pay more attention to the players' card strategy.
◆Multi-mode qualifying, enjoy the promotion from beginner to master.
◆Convenient and quick self-built house system, you can enjoy the fun of fighting the landlord with good friends.
◆Exquisite stand-up drawing, voice support, and immersive battle of landlords.
◆Use Live2D animation technology to make our characters move!
